about.title: About me
about.description:
Hi! My name is Tomasz, and I’ve been working as a taxi driver since 2017.
I’ve provided transport services for people with disabilities and driven children to school.
I hold all the necessary licenses and insurance required for passenger transport.
If you need a ride to the airport, hospital, or any other destination, I’ll do my best to meet your needs and make sure everyone who chooses my service arrives safely at their destination.
